title: As a Club user I want to reorder my Org's Pick Queue from the Draft Day screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:


Acceptance Criteria: 
* If the Pick Queue is visible and enabled, then the user has the ability to use drag and drop to reorder the players currently contained in the Pick Queue.  
* The system will automatically store any changes made to the Pick Queue without the user needing to save.

title: As a developer, I want the draft batch to flip to the following year and clear the cache on the draft flip date
custom_steps: The r4 batch should flush the draft state and players on the flip date and recreate a new draft state object in cache

title: As a developer I want the draft to get the full draft state and any selections upon reconnecting
custom_steps: If the clients internet connection goes down (or the websocket gets disconnected) upon reconnecting, the client should request, either from jboss or from vertx the draft state and selections.  Any selected players should be updated to drafted in the clients eligible player list.  The clients screens should be refreshed to the latest draft state.

title: As a BOC User, I want to use the auto-start feature on the Draft Day clock
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_clock_controls
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_draft_started

Acceptance Criteria:
 - There will be an Auto-start toggle on the Draft Day clock as depicted in the provided wire
 - Setting the toggle to Yes will activate the auto-start feature
 - If auto-start is enabled, the clock will return to its starting time and automatically begins counting down when the Approve button is clicked
 - If auto-start is enabled, and the clock reaches 0:00, the clock will stay at 0:00 until the Approve button is clicked

title: As a User, I want system rules governing Pausing the Draft and the Clock functions
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_draft_started

AC: 
 - Pause Draft:
   -- Only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors

 - Start clock:
   -- Only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors

 - Pause clock:
   -- Only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors

 - Reset clock:
   -- Only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors

 - Turn on clock's auto-start:
   -- Only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors

 - Turn off clock's auto-start:
  -- Only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors

title: As a BOC User, I want to be able to use the clock on the Draft Day Screen
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_clock_controls
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_draft_started

Acceptance Criteria:
 - The draft clock will default to 0:00
 - Clicking one of the time buttons will set the clock to the determined time
  -- (i.e. clicking the "4:00" button will set the the clock to 4:00)
 - User can also enter a specific time by clicking into the minute or seconds box
 - When the Start button is clicked, the clock will begin counting down to 0:00, and the Start button will change to a Pause button
 - Clicking the Pause button will stop the clock from counting down, freeze the time, and the Pause button will turn back to a Start button
   -- (i.e. if the clock was at 2:35 when the Pause button was clicked, the clock would stay at 2:35 until the Start or Reset button is clicked)
  - Clicking the Reset button will return the clock to the time it was initially set to
   -- (i.e. if the clock was initially set to 5:00 and the Reset button was clicked when the clock reach 1:42, the clock would reset to 5:00 and stay at that time until the Start button was clicked).

The draft clock should stay in sync across all clients in all time zones.

title: As a User, I want system rules governing submission of picks (or drafting for org) and passes
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_draft_started

AC: 
 - Submitting picks (or drafting for org) is only allowed by a user who has draft day editors

 - Submitting pass is only allowed by a user who has draft day editors


 - If the club submitting the pick does not match the current pick, generate error:  â€œYou can only submit picks/passes when your club is picking.â€￾
  -- Code value = R4_WRONG_CLUB


 - If the club submitting the pass does not match the current pick, generate error:  â€œYou can only submit picks/passes when your club is picking.â€￾
  -- Code value = R4_WRONG_CLUB


 - If the player who is submitted is not found, generate error: â€œNo eligible player has been foundâ€￾
  -- code value = R4_ELIG_NOT_FOUND


 - As Club user submitting, the player must be entered by the club who is submitting him OR MLSB, otherwise generate error: â€œNo eligible player has been foundâ€￾
  -- code value = R4_ELIG_NOT_FOUND


 - As BOC user drafting for org, the player must be entered by the club who is submitting him OR MLSB, otherwise generate error: â€œThis player was not submitted by {0} and therefore cannot be draftedâ€￾
  -- code value = R4_WRONG_ORG


 - If the player is already drafted, generate error: â€œThis player has already been drafted by {0} with overall pick number {1}â€￾ where {0} is the org and {1} is the overall pick
  -- code value = R4_ALREADY_DRAFTED

On all error messages, user will only be given a Back button.  When the Back button is clicked, the error message will be closed and no action will be taken.

title: As a Club User, I want to be prevented from submitting a player who is missing a consent form
custom_steps:
Old Wire:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=7_1_-_missing_draft_consent_form

AC:
 - If the player requires consent, and it has not been given, send the messages below:

 - BOC Warning Message
**Title:** Warning
**Body:** This player is missing a "Consent to Re-Select" form.
**Hint:** Do you want to draft this player anyway?
**Buttons:** Yes, No
 -- Clicking Yes will submit the player
 -- Clicking No will close the warning message
 -- code value = R4_MISSING_CONSENT


 - Club Error Messages
**Body:** You cannot submit a player who is missing a Consent to Re-Select form.
**Buttons:** Back
 -- Clicking Back will close the warning message
 -- code value = R4_MISSING_CONSENT

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to reject a submitted pick
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_player_rejected

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors
* When a player has been submitted for approval, the "Reject" button is enabled. 
* Clicking the "Reject" button will ask the BOC user to confirm they are sure they wish to Reject the pick.
**Title:** Warning
**Body:** Are you sure you want to reject the submitted pick?
**Hint:** Clicking Yes will reject the pick?
**Buttons:** Yes, No
* If they do not confirm, they are returned to the Draft Day with the player still loaded.
* If they do confirm, the player is cleared from the BOC's Draft Day screen.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to reject a pass on behalf of an Org from the Draft Day
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* When a Pass has been submitted for approval, the "Reject" button is enabled. 
* Clicking the "Reject" button will ask the BOC user to confirm they are sure they wish to Reject the pass.
* If they do not confirm, they are returned to the Draft Day with the Pass still loaded.
* If they do confirm, the pass is cleared from the Draft Day screen. 
* The Draft will stay on the current pick and the BOC or Club will be able to select a player, or resubmit a pass.

title: As a User, I want system rules governing approval of picks and passes
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_draft_started

AC: 
 - Approval of picks is only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors

 - Approval of passes is only allowed by BOC users with draft day editors

 - If the player does not have a position selected, generate error: â€œYou must select a positionâ€￾
  -- code value = R4_NO_POSITION

 - If the submitted pick has already been approved, generate error: â€œThis pick has already been approved.â€￾
  -- code value = R4_PICK_ALREADY_APPROVED

 - If the submitted pass has already been approved, generate error: â€œThis pick has already been approved.â€￾
  -- code value = R4_PICK_ALREADY_APPROVED

On all error messages, user will only be given a Back button.  When the Back button is clicked, the error message will be closed and no action will be taken.

title: As a Club user, I want to see if my pick or pass was rejected
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_player_rejected

AC:
 * If the BOC rejects a pick, the Club user will see the submitted player data (or pass) turns red, as depicted in the provided wire.
 * "Awaiting Approval" will also turn red and change to "Player Rejected"
* After 3 seconds:
  -- The Player data changes to black
  -- Position becomes editable
  -- "Player Rejected" changes to black "Selected Player"
  -- The trashcan is visible
  -- The buttons Submit Player and Pass are enabled
  -- A drop shadow is added to the Selected Player area
  -- The border color of the Selected Player area changes to blue

title: As a BOC User, I want to view the Commissioner's Screen Editor
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_import_text
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_current_year

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1419+Data+Discovery+-+CS+editor

Acceptance Criteria:
 - Users with the EBIS-RULE4-COMMISH-EDITORS permission will see a "Commissioners Screen Editor" tab under the "Rule 4 Draft" dashboard.
 - The browser tab should read "Commissioners Screen Editor"
 - Clicking on the "Commissioners Screen Editor" will load the Commissioners Screen Editor tab.
 - The Commissioners Screen Editor matches the provided wireframe.

title: As a BOC User, I want to view a previous year's text on the Commissioner's Screen Editor
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_import_text
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=comm_screen_editor_-_current_year

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1419+Data+Discovery+-+CS+editor

Acceptance Criteria:
 - On the Commissioners Screen Editor, there will a "Year" drop-down
 - If the current date is on or after the "Flip Draft to following year" system date, the Year drop-down will default to the year of the next draft
 - If the current date is before the "Flip Draft to following year" system date, the Year drop-down will default to the year of the previous draft
 - Selecting a prior year, will refresh the page and display the data from that year
 - Please note the sort order on the provided data discovery

title: As a User, I want MN Insurance Flag of No/Override unset when player is reinstated from IL
custom_steps:
The highmark batch will detect when a player who has their flag set to override no gets a reinstate from IL transaction and set their mn ins flags correctly.

AC:
 - If a player has their MN Insurance flag set to No/Override, and gets an approved Reinstate from IL transaction, the flag should be unset
 - If the player is now eligible for MN Insurance (not on Cleveland and not covered by MJ Insurance plan) the flag should be set to Yes
 - If the player is on Cleveland or covered by MJ Insurance, the flag should be set to No

title: As a user I want to see an environment indicator in training
custom_steps: Attached is an updated sprite with a banner for training added to the bottom.

title: As a user I want to see a new kind of Spring Training stats verification notification
custom_steps:
Batch Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Verify+Stats+versus+Player+profile

Clipboard: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJA+Clipboard+-+Batches

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The system is able to distinguish between Spring Training stats and regular season stats. 
* The system no longer generates notifications for Spring Training stats for any of the existing stats checks.
* The system starts generating a NEW stat notification for Spring Training stats ONLY. See #8 in the attached rules. 
* Ideally the notification would follow the format laid out in Clipboard#8 and show the offending Roster Status. (Ex: Player received stats with BOS on 2/28/2018 but had a Roster status of 60 Day DL). Roster status could be EITHER MJ or MN.
